title: Looking For Silver Mid/Top(13-15Years)
body:
Hey,
I have recently created a ranked team however we are still looking for members. With the newly introduced Battlegrounds we would hope to get some subs too so we can participate in the contests. However that is not the main objective, since all we wanna do is have some fun but also learn and hopefully climb some ranks as a team. We are all 13-15 so far and all speak english/german, if youre interested just add me in game: Dmonyar

You should preferably be also around 13-15 , speak english/german relatively well and bring some motivation and fun.

replies.body:
Hey,
Thanks for replying! The team is filling up a bit but we'd love to have you either way! we are speaking german right now in the team mainly however everyone understands and speaks english so they will respond. Silver2 and playing like a gold sounds great! I'll ad you in game and see if we can get a match and go on into the ranked team. Hope youre still interested!
WIth Kind Regards,
Dmonyar.

Hi im interessed in your Team. Im Main Top/Supp and Silber 2. But can Play like Gold. :D
14 years old ingamename Darth Dark
